name: firefox-tab-suspender
description: A Firefox extension that automatic suspend tabs and saves memory

scripts._dev:build_c: emcc src/background/c/utils/array_utils.c src/background/c/main.c -s WASM=1 -s RESERVED_FUNCTION_POINTERS=3 -s EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -o hello.wasm -o src/background/.tmp/service.js -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["cwrap"]' --js-library src/background/js/library.js
scripts._dist:build_c: emcc -O2 src/background/c/utils/array_utils.c src/background/c/main.c -s WASM=1 -s RESERVED_FUNCTION_POINTERS=3 -s EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -o hello.wasm -o src/background/.tmp/service.js -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["cwrap"]' --js-library src/background/js/library.js
scripts.dev:build: rm -f -r src/background/.tmp && mkdir src/background/.tmp && npm run _dev:build_c && NODE_ENV=development webpack && rm -f -r src/background/.tmp
scripts.dist:build: rm -f -r src/background/.tmp && mkdir src/background/.tmp && npm run _dist:build_c && NODE_ENV=production webpack -p && rm -f -r src/background/.tmp
